title: Hazardous waste generator permits
dataVerified: Generator name, EPA ID number, waste types, quantities, disposal, EPA/state
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Permit status (active/expired/revoked). Link to EPA/state hazmat agency system (enforcement and authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake hazmat permits. Domain binding verifies EPA/state hazmat agency. RCRA compliance. Prevents illegal dumping. Criminal prosecution for violations. Long retention for liability.
